sect1.title: Applications
sect1.para: This section describes some of the applications of RCE.

sect2.title: Preliminary Aircraft Design: Design of a short- to medium-range aircraft
sect2.para: From a paper presented at DLRK 2012: "Application of a distributed MDAO framework to the design of a short- to medium-range aircraft", E. Moerland, T. Zill, B. Nagel, H. Spangenberg, H. Schumann, P. Zamov

"The workflow consists of an initiation part, in which the initial aircraft model is generated, a high-lift concept and engine are added and the overall aerodynamic polars corresponding to the configuration are calculated. All the data is cumulatively stored in the CPACS data exchange format and forwarded to the iterative part. Herein, the initially calculated wing component masses using VAMPzero are updated using tools of higher-fidelity level. The connection to systems pre-design is established and a synthesis is performed. The calculation is continued until the aircraft masses are converged (i.e.: all snowball effects of changing individual component masses are incorporated)."
